name: Floating Awesome Button (Sticky Button & Popup) – CTA, Back to Top, Shortcodes, Widget, & More
author: Artistudio

sections.description:
Introducing Floating Awesome Button (FAB): Your versatile solution for enhancing user interaction! Craft customized sticky action buttons for diverse purposes—whether it’s compelling calls-to-action, smooth scroll-to-top functionality, or showcasing captivating custom popups with blocks, shortcodes, widgets, and links. Elevate your WordPress site’s engagement effortlessly with FAB.

🤩 Social media links & buttons :

Enhance your site’s social presence effortlessly! Instantly integrate customizable buttons and links to popular platforms, boosting engagement and connectivity with just a click.

  • 👍 Button : Call to Action – Simple Call-to-Action button.
  • 👍 Button : Standalone CTA Button – Modifiable Button
  • 👍 Contact : Email contact link.
  • 👍 Contact : Phone/Call contact link.
  • 👍 Contact : SMS link.
  • 👍 Contact : Skype link.
  • 👍 Contact : WhatsApp link.
  • 👍 Link : Donation – Add donation link for your campaign.
  • 👍 Link : Dropbox file share link.
  • 👍 Link : Google Drive file share link.
  • 👍 Link : Latest Post – Your latest blog post link.
  • 👍 Link : Login – Your WordPress login link.
  • 👍 Link : Logout – Secure WordPress logout link.
  • 👍 Link : Lost Password – Your WordPress lost password link.
  • 👍 Social Media : Facebook link for pages, profile & groups.
  • 👍 Social Media : Instagram link.
  • 👍 Social Media : Telegram link.
  • 👍 Social Media : TikTok link.
  • 👍 Social Media : Twitter link.
  • 👍 Social Media : WhatsApp link.
  • 👍 Social Media : Zoom link.

🤤 Navigation links & buttons :

Seamlessly implement back-to-top, anchor links, smooth scroll, reading bar, and sticky menu options. Enhance user experience and site usability with ease.

  • 👍 Button : Back to Top/Scroll to Top
  • 👍 Button : Floating Elements
  • 👍 Button : Print
  • 👍 Link : Anchor Link
  • 👍 Link : Smooth Scroll
  • 👍 Navigation : Reading Bar
  • 👍 Navigation : Sticky Menu

😎 Custom Template Popup :

Introducing Custom Template Popup: Transform engagement with captivating popups tailored to your needs. From contact forms to ebook promotions and subscription prompts, effortlessly captivate your audience and drive conversions.

  • 👍 Contact & Opt-in : Contact Form Popup
  • 👍 Contact & Opt-in : Ebook Popup
  • 👍 Contact & Opt-in : Subscribe Popup
  • 👍 Notification : Covid 19 Popup
  • 👍 Service & Payment : Booking Popup
  • 👍 Service & Payment : Membership Popup
  • 👍 Service & Payment : Payment Popup
  • 👍 Offers : Discount Popup
  • 👍 Offers : Promo Popup

😲 Special Function Popup :

Discover Special Function Popup: Elevate user interaction with dynamic popups that cater to diverse needs. From dynamic sidebars to login/logout prompts, effortlessly enhance user experience and site functionality.

  • 👍 Custom : Shortcode Popup
  • 👍 Custom : Widget Popup
  • 👍 Media : Image Popup
  • 👍 Media : Soundcloud Popup
  • 👍 Media : Spotify Popup
  • 👍 Media : TikTok Popup
  • 👍 Media : Twitch Stream Popup
  • 👍 Media : Twitch Chat Popup
  • 👍 Media : Vimeo Popup
  • 👍 Media : YouTube Popup
  • 👍 Navigation : Ajax Search/Search Palette Popup
  • 👍 Navigation : Dynamic Sidebars Popup
  • 👍 Navigation : Login Popup
  • 👍 Navigation : Logout Popup
  • 👍 Navigation : Table of Content Popup
  • 👍 Template : Popup with Custom Overlay
  • 👍 Template : Popup with Maximize Button
  • 👍 Woocommerce : Product Catalog

🎥 More Tutorial on YouTube :

  • Documentation | Tutorial | Cases | Reacts

Features

Unlock limitless possibilities with our Free Version! Elevate your WordPress site’s functionality today!

  • 🤓 Unlimited custom floating action button
  • 🤓 1500+ Support FontAwesome Icons
  • 🤓 Beautiful User Interface (UI)
  • 🤓 Ability to personalize action buttons with theme
  • 🤓 Multiple button positions (Left, Center, Right)
  • 🤓 Multiple buttons shapes 10+ Shapes (Bevel, Circle, Message, Octagon, Pentagon, etc)
  • 🤓 Multiple popup navigation (Draggable, BackgroundDismiss, EscapeKey, Maximize Button, etc)

Pro Version

Upgrade to Pro for an arsenal of advanced features! Revolutionize your WordPress site with FAB Pro!

  • 🤯 PRO Ability to custom filter by :
    • Custom Post Type : Filter by any CPT.
    • Page/Post : Filter by Page/Post.
    • Taxonomies & Terms : Filter by (Categories, Tags, etc).
    • User Session : Filter by session (Logged in/out).
    • User Roles : Filter by any user roles.
  • 🤯 PRO Ability to custom filter by Device (Desktop, Tablet, & Mobile)
  • 🤯 PRO Ability to change fab & popup animation (Fade, Bounce, Zoom, Flip, etc) (25+ Animation)
  • 🤯 PRO Map modal with a custom hotkey (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, Function Key, & Combined) (258+ Hotkeys)
  • 🤯 PRO Ability to change popup theme :
    • Blank : Simple blank theme.
    • Window Light : Mac OS like window light popup theme.
    • Window Dark : Mac OS like window dark popup theme.
  • 🤯 PRO Ability to add Auto Trigger for Modal/Popup :
    • Adblock : Improve your site revenues from ads.
    • Cookie Control : Control cookies usage for GDPR compliance.
    • Exit Intent : Improve your conversion rates.
    • Time Delay : Auto trigger popup using time delay.

3rd Party API & Plugins Support

  • 🕹 Google reCaptcha v2 & v3
  • 🧩 Contact Form 7 | 🎥 Tutorial
  • 🧩 Easy Table of Content | 🎥 Tutorial
  • 🧩 Elementor | 🎥 Tutorial
  • 🧩 Gutenberg | 🎥 Tutorial
  • 🧩 Gravity Form
  • 🧩 WPForms

Sharing is Caring

⭐⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
We appreciate your support in using our plugin! Your feedback fuels our growth and success.
Help us reach more users by sharing your positive experience with friends and colleagues.
Together, we can make WordPress experiences even more awesome! 👊 🥳 👍
sections.installation:
Instruction :

  • You can install the plugin from the WordPress Plugin Repositories or
  • Download the plugin and extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation

Tutorial :

  • 🎥 How to Install WordPress Floating Awesome Button Plugin

Releases :

  • To see a complete release versions of the plugins you can go to :
  • changelog.txt
sections.faq:
🕵️‍ GDPR

  • This plugin uses 3rd party tools for (Payments & Upgrades) it’s called Freemius
  • To learn more about GDPR consent please this article
  • We also use cookies internally to store popup session, but it’s not enable by default see this video to learn more

🔧 Troubleshoot Search Modal Popup (Ajax Search)?

This plugin is uses WP REST API for search modal popup
If you have any trouble when setting up the plugin please make sure :

  • Your WP REST API is enabled, check your security plugin if there is any setting that is disabling it.
  • Make sure your permalinks is set to Post name (admin, settings, permalinks, choose “Post Name”)
sections.changelog:
1.7.1 (04.06.2024)

  • Major bug fixes and add support to WordPress 6.5.3

1.6.0 (19.11.2022)

  • Major bug fixes and supports

1.5.18 (17.11.2022)

  • Update readme.txt file, add support to WordPress 6

1.5.16 (11.04.2022)

  • HOTFIX: Tooltip always display can’t be disabled
  • Add Print.js library for print button
  • Enable targeted element print using id, image, pdf, html
  • Fully migrate backend scripts into svelte components for better performance

1.5.15 (08.03.2022)

  • Update font awesome version to 6.0.0
  • HOTFIX: Layout position center
  • HOTFIX: FAB edge unclickable
  • Upgrade tailwindcss to v3
  • Improve exit intent using exit-intent-quattro library

1.5.14 (03.03.2022)

  • Modify readme.txt & add support for print button type

1.5.12

  • Tailwindcss class integration update for modal template

1.5.11

  • Add tooltip option always display for call to action button with text
  • Migrate css tooltip popup to tooltip labels

1.5.10

  • HOTFIX: FAB type link metabox design option not working

1.5.9

  • Restructure CSS styles to use less space
  • Optimize gutenberg support (Autoembed & Render)

1.5.8

  • Add option standalone button
  • HOTFIX: FAB shapes single and group

1.5.5

  • Add Gutenberg Support
  • Migrate backend metabox design to components
  • Optimize frontend asset delivery

1.5.3

  • HOTFIX: Enable/Disable Tooltip
  • HOTFIX: FAB Shape not changing
  • HOTFIX: Grecaptcha on mobile
  • Migrate backend setting to components

For older changelog entries, please see the additional changelog.txt delivered with the plugin.
